duties_responsibilities.duty: Operate and maintain heavy equipment for construction, maintenance, and excavation purposes.
Follow company safety procedures and report any issues to supervisors or managers.
Perform routine inspections and preventive maintenance on assigned equipment, and report defects or needed repairs.
Possess knowledge of moisture condition, cut grade, and the ability to load trucks.
Specialize in operating one or more of the following equipment: Excavator, Dozer, Roller, Motor Grader.
Must have 3-5 years of recent experience in construction as a heavy equipment operator.
Ability to multi-task in a fast-paced environment with a strong attention to detail.
High school diploma or GED preferred.
